titles.title: If I Go Away I Will Come Again To You

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
If I go away I will come again to you.
If I go away I will come again to you.
If I go away I will come again to you.
Jesus said, I will come again to you.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Can't you hear the sound of the trumpet in the Land?
He has come again and you'll see Him in the clouds.
Can't you hear the sound of the trumpet of the Land?
Jesus said, I will come again to you.
